blog_posts.title: Grand Theft Auto V
blog_posts.content: Set within the fictional state of San Andreas, based on Southern California, the single-player story follows three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a government agency.
blog_posts.preview: Set within the fictional state of San Andreas, based on Southern California, the single-player story follows three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a government agency.

blog_posts.title: Minecraft
blog_posts.content: The game allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world, requiring creativity from players.
blog_posts.preview: The game allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world, requiring creativity from players.

blog_posts.title: Street Fighter II
blog_posts.content: Is a competitive fighting game developed by Capcom and originally released for arcade systems in 1991.
blog_posts.preview: Is a competitive fighting game developed by Capcom and originally released for arcade systems in 1991.

blog_posts.title: Mario Kart DS
blog_posts.content: is a go-kart racing video game developed and published by Nintendo.
blog_posts.preview: is a go-kart racing video game developed and published by Nintendo.
